import React, { Component, Fragment, useState } from "react"; import 'react-notifications/lib/notifications.css'; import { NotificationContainer, NotificationManager } from 'react-notifications'; import { Button, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, FormGroup, Form, Input, Row, Col } from "reactstrap"; import { graphql } from 'react-apollo'; import { Mutation } from "react-apollo"; import queries from 'queries/Empresas.jsx'; import { AvForm, AvField } from 'availity-reactstrap-validation'; import Badgeuser from "components/badges/badgeUser"; import Notification from "components/notifications/notifications.jsx" class Formuser extends React.Component { state = {} componentDidMount() { this.setState({ nombre: this.props.datos.nombre, correo: this.props.datos.correo, provincia: this.props.datos.provincia, canton: this.props.datos.canton, distrito: this.props.datos.distrito, }) } handleChange = e => { this.setState({ ... this.state, [e.target.name]: e.target.value, }); }; render() { const { nombre, usuario, correo, provincia, canton, distrito }= this.state; const onChange = this.handleChange; const datosestado = this.state; return ( <>
{this.props.title}
 } onError={}> {postEmpresa => } ); } } export default graphql(queries.addEmpresas)(Formuser); // export default Formuser; // mutation onCompleted={() => this.props.history.push('/')}
